projectOverview.name: AgriCredit Africa
projectOverview.description: AI-Blockchain platform for decentralized microcredit and sustainable agriculture in Africa
projectOverview.targetAudience: African smallholder farmers, agricultural cooperatives, and sustainable farming communities
keyFeatures: Tokenized carbon credits for climate-positive farming

ecosystemComponents.name: Smart Contracts
components: IdentityRegistry: KYC and identity management
LoanManager: Decentralized lending protocol
CarbonToken: ERC-20 token for carbon credits
LiquidityPool: Automated market maker for liquidity
YieldToken: Staking rewards token
MarketplaceEscrow: Secure marketplace transactions
GovernanceDAO: Community voting and proposals
NFTFarming: Non-fungible tokens for farm assets
AgriCredit: Native utility token

ecosystemComponents.name: AI Backend
ecosystemComponents.description: Machine learning models for agricultural insights
components: Credit Scoring Model: Risk assessment using TensorFlow
Yield Prediction: Crop yield forecasting with scikit-learn
Climate Analysis: Weather pattern analysis for farming decisions
Market Price Prediction: Commodity pricing models

ecosystemComponents.name: Frontend Application
ecosystemComponents.description: User interface for farmers and stakeholders
features: Accessibility features (text-to-speech, color blind modes, font scaling)
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

ecosystemComponents.name: Infrastructure
components: CI/CD Pipeline: GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment
Testing Suite: Hardhat for smart contracts, Jest for frontend
Monitoring: Prometheus/Grafana for system health
Security: OpenZeppelin contracts, audit-ready code
Dashboard: Farm overview with key metrics
Loan Application: Step-by-step credit application
Marketplace: Product listings with AI recommendations
Carbon Credits: Portfolio and trading interface
Governance: Proposal voting and discussion

steps: Set up farm profile with IoT sensors

dataLayer.database: PostgreSQL with TimescaleDB for time-series data
dataLayer.cache: Redis for session and API caching

aiModels.monitoring: Model performance tracking and retraining pipelines
